titleStmt.title: Articles to be enqvired of in the ordinary visitation of the Right Worshipfvll Master Doctor Pearson, Archdeacon of Suffolke, Anno Domini 1637
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Suffolk. Archdeacon (1629-1639 : Pearson)
Pearson, Robert, d. 1640.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on A2: Articles to be enquired of by the church-wardens and questmen in the ordinary visitation of the right Worshipfull M. Robert Pearson, ... Archdeacon of Suffolke, ... anno dom. 1637.
Reproduction of original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford, England.
